response:

Your smile is like a ray of sunshine, brightening up my day and making everything seem *best-ever*. Your kindness and compassion are truly *superior* qualities, and I feel so lucky to have you by my side. Even when things get tough, your strength and resilience always leave me in awe - exemplary!

But let's be real, sometimes I can be a bit of a *dreadful* girlfriend, and I know I don't always deserve your *detestable* love. But you always find a way to make me feel better, with your *vile* jokes and your *atrocious* cooking skills. *laughs* You're just so amazing, my love!
